behavior_explanation.schedule_on: If true, the task will run only at specified times. If false, it will run continuously.
behavior_explanation.timeout_on: If true, the task will repeat at the specified interval. If false, it will run only once per scheduled time.
behavior_explanation.days_of_week: List of days when the task should run (only used if schedule_on is true)
behavior_explanation.time_of_day: Time of day to run the task in 24-hour format (only used if schedule_on is true)
behavior_explanation.timeout_interval: Time in seconds between task executions (used if timeout_on is true)

execution_scenarios.behavior: Task runs at specified days and time, then repeats at timeout_interval
Task runs once at specified days and time, then waits until next scheduled time
Task runs continuously, waiting for timeout_interval between executions
Task runs continuously without any delay between executions
